example.en: I can't understand her way of thinking at all.

example.en: Sadly, for my kind, coming here is a one-way ticket.

example.en: But it could just as easily have gone the other way.

example.en: I was in a bad way when I got here.

example.en: But you're not getting your speed the same way Barry got his.
example.vi: Nhưng con không có được tốc độ của mình như cái cách mà Barry đã có.

example.en: I walked through the emergency department on my way home.

example.en: Our last stop was under a cherry tree a short way from the house .

example.en: But man’s ways are not and never will be the Lord’s ways.

example.en: Perhaps we once had the habit of pressing matters until we got our way.

example.en: It is everyone’s sure way to know; it is everyone’s lifeline to heaven.
example.vi: Đó là cách chắc chắn cho mọi người để biết; đó là đường giao thông huyết mạch đến thiên thượng.
